properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of toast - can be (success, error, warn, light)

properties.name: position
properties.description: The position of toast on page - can be (top-left, top-right, top-center, left, right, center, bottom-left, bottom-right, bottom-center)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: The hiding status of the toast.

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: The time before toast get hidden. default is null - (Always visible until user closes toast)

events.name: closed
events.description: event is emitted whenever toast get close by user action or by timeout
